description: ChArUco calibration board with AprilTag36h11 markers embedded in checkerboard pattern

print_specification.mounting: Rigid backing (aluminum plate, acrylic, or foam board)

usage.purpose: Camera intrinsic calibration for Nikon D5600 + 50mm lens
usage.lighting: Diffuse, avoid specular highlights on markers

notes: Print at 600 DPI for accurate marker dimensions
Mount to rigid substrate to maintain flatness
Verify square size with calipers after printing (should measure 10.0 ± 0.1 mm)
Black squares on white background for optimal contrast
